languages.text: "Мы сумели отсечь периферийные силы от тех, что проникли во дворец, и продолжаем штурм здания. Мы уничтожили множество тварей, однако ксеносы сопротивляются нашей атаке как бешеные — они словно выжидают. Или, быть может, еще не закончили с тем, ради чего так стремились попасть во дворец".

"We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."
languages.original_text: "Мы сумели отсечь периферийные силы от тех, что проникли во дворец, и продолжаем штурм здания. Мы уничтожили множество тварей, однако ксеносы сопротивляются нашей атаке как бешеные — они словно выжидают. Или, быть может, еще не закончили с тем, ради чего так стремились попасть во дворец".

We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they aren't yet finished with whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

"We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they aren't yet finished with whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

"We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

languages.text: 「宮殿内に侵入した部隊から周辺部隊を切り離し、建物への襲撃を続けています。大勢の侵入者を始末しましたが、異種族どもは猛烈な勢いで我々の攻撃を退けています―まるで何かのタイミングを待っているかのようです。もしくは、まだ宮殿内での目的を達成できていないのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: 「宮殿内に侵入した部隊から周辺部隊を切り離し、建物への襲撃を続けています。大勢の侵入者を始末しましたが、異種族どもは猛烈な勢いで我々の攻撃を退けています―まるで何かのタイミングを待っているかのようです。もしくは、まだ宮殿内での目的を達成できていないのかもしれません」

languages.text: “我们已经切断了他们的通讯，开始对宫殿发起猛攻，攻入宫殿内部的敌人已经无法与外围支援部队取得联系。我们消灭了许多异形，但他们仍在凶狠地负隅反抗，感觉就像是他们在等待什么时机一样。也有可能，那些冲进宫殿的敌人并没有完成他们本该实现的目标。”
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经切断了他们的通讯，开始对宫殿发起猛攻，攻入宫殿内部的敌人已经无法与外围支援部队取得联系。我们消灭了许多异形，但他们仍在凶狠地负隅反抗，感觉就像是他们在等待什么时机一样。也有可能，那些冲进宫殿的敌人并没有完成他们本该实现的目标。”

languages.text: «Hemos aislado las fuerzas periféricas de las del interior del palacio y seguimos asaltando el edificio. Hemos matado a montones de esas bestias, pero los xenos rechazan nuestros ataques con ferocidad. Es como si esperaran el momento exacto. O como si todavía no hubieran completado el objetivo que les haya llevado al palacio».
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos aislado las fuerzas periféricas de las del interior del palacio y seguimos asaltando el edificio. Hemos matado a montones de esas bestias, pero los xenos rechazan nuestros ataques con ferocidad. Es como si esperaran el momento exacto. O como si todavía no hubieran completado el objetivo que les haya llevado al palacio».

languages.text: « Nous avons isolé les xénos qui se trouvent dans le palais pour les séparer des troupes secondaires et nous continuons de faire pression sur le bâtiment. Nous avons éliminé un grand nombre de ces monstres, mais ils repoussent farouchement nos assauts. C'est comme s'ils attendaient un moment propice... Ou peut-être n'ont-ils pas encore accompli l'objectif qui les a menés dans le palais en premier lieu. »
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons isolé les xénos qui se trouvent dans le palais pour les séparer des troupes secondaires et nous continuons de faire pression sur le bâtiment. Nous avons éliminé un grand nombre de ces monstres, mais ils repoussent farouchement nos assauts. C'est comme s'ils attendaient un moment propice... Ou peut-être n'ont-ils pas encore accompli l'objectif qui les a menés dans le palais en premier lieu. »

languages.text: "Wir haben die äußeren Truppen von denen abgeschnitten, die in den Palast eingedrungen sind, und wir stürmen das Gebäude weiterhin. Wir haben viele dieser Bestien getötet, aber die Xenos schlagen unseren Angriff mit großer Wildheit zurück – als würden sie auf den richtigen Augenblick warten. Oder sie haben das Ziel noch nicht erreicht, das sie im Palast verfolgen."
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben die äußeren Truppen von denen abgeschnitten, die in den Palast eingedrungen sind, und wir stürmen das Gebäude weiterhin. Wir haben viele dieser Bestien getötet, aber die Xenos schlagen unseren Angriff mit großer Wildheit zurück – als würden sie auf den richtigen Augenblick warten. Oder sie haben das Ziel noch nicht erreicht, das sie im Palast verfolgen."

languages.text: "Düşmanın dıştaki kuvvetlerini saraya girenlerden ayırmayı başardık. Şu anda binaya taarruz etmeyi sürdürüyoruz. Sayısız zeno öldürdük ancak saldırımıza şiddetle karşı koyuyorlar. Âdeta bir şey için fırsat kolluyorlar. Belki de sarayda aradıklarını henüz bulamamışlardır."
languages.original_text: "We've cut off the periphery forces from those that made it inside the palace, and we continue to storm the building. We've killed so many of those beasts, but the xenos are repelling our assault with ferocity — it's as if they're waiting for the right moment. Or perhaps they haven't yet completed whatever goal they're pursuing inside the palace."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanın diğer kuvvetlerini saraya girenlerden ayırmayı başardık. Şu anda binaya taarruz etmeyi sürdürüyoruz. Sayısız zeno öldürdük ancak saldırımıza şiddetle karşı koyuyorlar. Âdeta bir şey için fırsat kolluyorlar. Ya da sarayda aradıklarını henüz bulamadılar."
